channel.title: TryHackMe - "HTB with walkthroughs"
channel.description:
I came across this in the sponsored section for the [upcoming xmas CTF](https://ctftime.org/event/926). It's a breed between HTB and a walkthrough, splitting difficult tasks up into byte sized chunks. If you get stuck at one bit, it usually has a very descriptive task or a good hint that allows you to research into the subject and then continue on. Definitely a more linear path but a great learning experience in my opinion. I've learned a lot from the small amount of time I've spent on there so I thought I'd share the link with all of you guys and see what you guys think about it.
[https://tryhackme.com/](https://tryhackme.com/)
Plus, if you get stuck on a challenge and can't find the solution, you can ask for help in their discord channel and usually you receive it in a very short amount of time, definitely a great community for beginners who want to get into pentesting.

item.title: TryHackMe - "HTB with walkthroughs"
item.dc:creator: c0wm1lk
item.description:
After a bit more exploring I see they also have normal CTF problems, so it’s not all HTB styled but from what I’ve seen most of it is.

Read full topic
